creditline: Gift of Tamara and Michael Root
description: large bottle with constricted neck and flared lip, ovoid body that narrows to base; dark brown thin vertical stripes on body that are slightly twisted; body is tan, slightly greenish in top half and reddish in lower half; neck is brown
markings: paper label adhered to bottom: HANDTHROWN / STONEWARE / HARRISON / McINTOSH / CLAREMONT / CALIFORNIA; handwritten paper label on bottom: #9037
medium: Hand thrown cone 5 stoneware with light green and tan glaze; mishima lines
signed: impressed maker\'s mark: HM on bottom of foot
title: Bottle
